speaker: speaker1
text: What are you going to do for one year abroad , Tom ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Study , study , study . I want to learn a lot .

speaker: speaker1
text: You are going to take courses ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Yes . I am going to take some university courses there .

speaker: speaker2
text: Yes , but I think it's probably for the best .

speaker: speaker2
text: Hey , I am a pretty cool guy . I will make friends , and I'll have a lot of extracurricular activities too . You know , like fencing , or theater or something .
